about_the_game:
Explore the universe in this single-player cyberpunk adventure, with a little cow that will turn your world upside down.



There are many popular tales and urban legends about extraterrestrials abducting cows, but what happens to the cows after they’ve been abducted?
On a peaceful planet inhabited by cows that just walk, graze, and fart, an innocent cow is abducted to a strange planet and placed in a prison.
After managing to escape, she begins to explore this new world, looking for ways to return home.
What was once just another cow in the pasture, transforms into an individual with personality, fears, and desires.
Her journey goes beyond the discovery of other worlds: it’s a journey of self-discovery.

360º PLATAFORM



Move all around the planet and turn the ceiling into the floor with a gravity-switching mechanic.

WHAT'S IN THIS DEMO?



In this demo, you will get to know Mooh’s home planet and face the very first challenge of all: the first unknown planet.

FIX THE SPACESHIP



Find and collect the necessary parts to repair a broken ship and take the character away from there.

MIMOSAS



Mooh wasn’t the only one abducted! To save other cows, which we affectionately call "mimosas," you need to find the cells where they are held captive and set them free.

ENEMIES AND PUZZLES



Face the enemies, solve the puzzles of planet 1 and get ready for the challenges ahead! Mooh is just getting started.
detailed_description:
Explore the universe in this single-player cyberpunk adventure, with a little cow that will turn your world upside down.



There are many popular tales and urban legends about extraterrestrials abducting cows, but what happens to the cows after they’ve been abducted?
On a peaceful planet inhabited by cows that just walk, graze, and fart, an innocent cow is abducted to a strange planet and placed in a prison.
After managing to escape, she begins to explore this new world, looking for ways to return home.
What was once just another cow in the pasture, transforms into an individual with personality, fears, and desires.
Her journey goes beyond the discovery of other worlds: it’s a journey of self-discovery.

360º PLATAFORM



Move all around the planet and turn the ceiling into the floor with a gravity-switching mechanic.

WHAT'S IN THIS DEMO?



In this demo, you will get to know Mooh’s home planet and face the very first challenge of all: the first unknown planet.

FIX THE SPACESHIP



Find and collect the necessary parts to repair a broken ship and take the character away from there.

MIMOSAS



Mooh wasn’t the only one abducted! To save other cows, which we affectionately call "mimosas," you need to find the cells where they are held captive and set them free.

ENEMIES AND PUZZLES



Face the enemies, solve the puzzles of planet 1 and get ready for the challenges ahead! Mooh is just getting started.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M (2 * 2500)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U (2 * 1800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Mooh Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This demo is the first part of Mooh's adventure! Explore space with a little cow who was abducted and is trying to find her way back home. Explore planets, solve puzzles, save the mimosas, and collect parts to upgrade the ship that will take Mooh back home.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
